overview:
Over 10-year experience focused in integrated communication, interactive and mobile media.

Experience in management of digital agency start ups. Follow up of business plan and structuring of all the departments of an agency: accounting, planning, media and creative.

Experience in identification of new media opportunities, with the objective of increasing profitability and competitiveness.

Experience in strategic planning of campaigns for brands and products as well as in the management of relationship between agency and big clients of several segments.

Experience in the leading teams, negotiations and inter personal relationship with all the levels of an agency.

Specialties Strategy and development of web based and mobile startups.
